title: Roger Malvins Burial experience of the forest

content.question: The narrator’s statement in the first sentence of the final paragraph (“The tangled . . . happiness”) implies that the family’s experience in the forest

choices.label: corresponds exactly to the “dreamer’s land of fantasy” (paragraph 3, sentence 1)
shows that their apprehensions have been realized
proves that they are determined to persevere
reveals a dangerous risk that they should have avoided

content.answer: proves that they are determined to persevere

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the function of setting in a narrative.
